ingredients: 1 tablespoon(s) olive oil or vegetable oil
1 large or 2 small cloves of garlic minced
2 can(s) 15 oz diced tomatoes with juice
2 can(s) 15 oz tomato sauce or more for a saucier chili
2 can(s) 15 oz kidney beans drained and rinsed
1 can(s) 15 oz great northern beans drained and rinsed
1 can(s) 15 oz black beans drained and rinsed
